item.title: Want to overflow buffers?
item.description:
Introduction

This writeup will include a comprehensive walkthrough of the ‘bof’ room from the Toddler’s Bottle section on pwnable. If you don’t know about pwnable, it is a wargame site that hosts a collection of challenges regarding system exploitation. Check it out here â†’ pwnable.kr

If you are here and have no clue what a buffer overflow is, my goal is to give you a good enough understanding of what it is and how it is exploited so that you can recreate it in your own environment.
